definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: There is going to be an English speaking contest in Dudan University next month.
sentences.chinese: 下月在復旦大學將有一場英語演講賽。

sentences.english: Department of Gastroenterology, Huashan Hospital, Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 復旦大學附屬華山醫院消化科。

sentences.english: Here to discuss these issues is ProfessorJing Yijia from Fudan University. He specializes in public administration.
sentences.chinese: 來討論這一問題的是復旦大學公共管理教授敬義嘉。

sentences.english: University is renowned as the best university south of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 復旦大學享有“江南第一學府”的美譽。

sentences.english: Fudan University is renowned as the best university south of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 復旦大學享有“江南第一學府”的美譽。

sentences.english: Guo Juan is deputy director of the Office of Student Affairs at Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 郭娟是復旦大學學生會的副主席。

sentences.english: Peng Xizhe is the Director of the Institute of Population Research at Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 彭希哲是復旦大學人口研究所所長。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Department of Chemistry, National Fudan University in 1947.
sentences.chinese: 1947年畢業於國立復旦大學化學系。

sentences.english: Li Ting, a student in Fudan University, is a handkerchief user who carries a handkerchief everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 復旦大學學生李婷就是一位手帕不離身的“帕客”。

sentences.english: Mei N. M. S. Thesis, Fudan University, Shanghai, 2004 (in Chinese).
sentences.chinese: 梅娜，碩士論文，復旦大學，上海，2004。

sentences.english: Chen G. M. S. Thesis, Fudan University, Shanghai, 2003 (in Chinese).
sentences.chinese: 陳光，碩士論文，復旦大學，上海，2003。

sentences.english: He also holds a BS degree from Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 他還擁有復旦大學的理學士學位。

sentences.english: The Students' Union of Fudan University called on all the students to dine in the canteen in a civilized way.
sentences.chinese: 復旦大學學生會要求全校學生在餐廳文明用餐。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of the Department of Occupational Health.
sentences.chinese: 這是復旦大學公共衛生學院勞動衛生教研室的網頁。

sentences.english: We are currently helping underprivileged first year students ofFudan University.
sentences.chinese: 目前資助對象是復旦大學大一特困生。
